nodes.text: An empire located in the Unknown Regions of the galaxy which was founded by the alien Warlord Nuso Esva.

In 0 ABY, several months after the battle of Yavin, they would go into direct conflict with Galactic Empire, with a force led by Senior Captain Thrawn. Esva planned on expanding his empire into Imperial Space, but had to directly take care of Thrawn first. This, of course, would back fire and Esva was badly defeated in the Poln system, after over estimating Thrawn.

In 8 ABY, after the battle of Endor, not much remained of the territory of the empire, and Esva had his forces stationed on Quethold. Thrawn, who assets who had now diverged into the Empire of the Hand, arrived above the planet, and begun a planetary assault. Esva, realizing defeat, executed the Queen of the Red, but didn't make it and was gunned down by the Queen's soldiers. This defeat, would mark an end for the empire, with it disbanding within Esva's death.

The Firekilns was a powerful, capital warship. They served as the primary symbol of the military power. According to Thrawn, at least five of these had the combined firepower equivalent to a Imperial-class Star Destroyer.

Whisperlike-class starfighters, served as primary fighters for the fleet. At least one would be captured by Vaantaar, a male Troukree who served as a secret agent to Thrawn. This, would allow Thrawn to examine the ship, and learn much about Nuso Esva's tactics, and military philosophy.
